00040 #ifndef PACC_SVG_Styles_hpp_
00041 #define PACC_SVG_Styles_hpp_
00042 
00043 #include "PACC/SVG/Types.hpp"

00045 #include "PACC/Util/StringFunc.hpp"
00046 #include "PACC/Util/Assert.hpp"
00047 
00048 namespace PACC {
00049     
00050     using namespace String;
00051     
00052     namespace SVG {
00053         
00054         using namespace std;
00055         
00056         class Style;
00057         
00065         class Attribute : public pair<string, string> {
00066          public:
00067             Attribute(const string& inName, const string& inValue);
00068 
00069             Style operator+(const Attribute& inAttribute) const;
00070             Style operator+(const Style& inAttrList) const;
00071         };
00072         
00080         class Style : public XML::AttributeList {
00081          public:
00082             
00084             Style() {}
00085             
00087             Style(const Attribute& inAttribute) {insert(inAttribute);}
00088             
00090             Style(const XML::AttributeList& inList) : XML::AttributeList(inList) {}
00091             
00093             Style operator+(const Style& inAttrList) const {
00094                 return Style(*this) += inAttrList;
00095             }
00096             
00098             Style& operator+=(const Style& inAttrList) {
00099                 for(Style::const_iterator lPos = inAttrList.begin(); lPos != inAttrList.end(); ++lPos) {
00100                     (*this)[lPos->first] = lPos->second;
00101                 }
00102                 return *this;
00103             }
00104         };
00105         
00106         // functions to make style attibutes
00107         const Attribute fillColor(const Color& inColor);
00108         const Attribute fillOpacity(double inValue);
00109         const Attribute fillRule(RuleType inType);
00110         const Attribute fontFamily(const string& inName);
00111         const Attribute fontStyle(FontType inType);
00112         const Attribute fontSize(double inValue);
00113         const Attribute opacity(double inValue);
00114         const Attribute strokeColor(const Color& inColor);
00115         const Attribute strokeDash(const string& inDash);
00116         const Attribute strokeDash(const vector<double>& inDash);
00117         const Attribute strokeDash(DashType inType);
00118         const Attribute strokeLineCap(CapType inType);
00119         const Attribute strokeLineJoin(JoinType inType);
00120         const Attribute strokeMiterLimit(double inRatio);
00121         const Attribute strokeOpacity(double inValue);
00122         const Attribute strokeWidth(double inValue);
00123         const Attribute textAnchor(AnchorType inType);
00124         const Attribute textBaseline(BaselineType inType);
00125         
00126     } // end of SVG namespace
